name: Keldeo
description: The Colt Pokémon. It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.

abilities.name: Justified
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a dark-type move, it gets advantage on its next attack.

abilities.name: Form Change (Keldeo)
abilities.description: Keldeo's standard form is Ordinary Form. When it learns the move Secret Sword, it changes into Resolute Form as long as the move is in its move list.
